post:
Hello, McMyHost is a new but very high quality VPS host. Our goal is to bring quality to the low end market. We guarantee the highest level of service possible and it is our job to keep you clients happy. If you are not pleased with our services do not hesitate to tell us what we can do better. 


 

We believe in using the newest and best technology. Because of this, we offer the Feathur Control Panel (developed by BlueVM) and OpenVZ virtualization. We also offer the latest OS templates such as Debian 7 and Fedora 19.

 

 -------------------

 

 The offers for today are based off of OpenVZ virtualization.

 

-------------------

 

 Features

 

  1. Feathur Control Panel

 

  2. Instant Setup / Provisioning

 

  3. Large choice of OS Templates

 

  4. Full Root Access (We don't limit what you do)

 

  5. 1Gbps Network Port

 

-------------------

 

 So? What are these plans?

 

-------------------

 

Monthly OpenVZ VPS Plans

 

 OVZ 1

 

   RAM: 512MB

   VSWAP: 512MB

   Cores: 1vCPU Core

   25GB RAID 1+0 (10) HDD

   1 IPv4 Address

   500GB Bandwidth

   Promocode = 3permonth

 

  Price: $4.00/m $3/m Order Now

 

  OVZ 2

 

   RAM: 1024MB (1GB)

   VSWAP: 1024MB (1GB)

   Cores: 1vCPU Core

   50GB RAID 1+0 (10) HDD

   Up to 3 IPv4 Address (Please provide justification)

   1TB Bandwidth

   Promocode = 1gbram

 

 Price: $7.00/m $5/m Order Now

 

  OVZ 3

 

   RAM: 2048MB (2GB)

   VSWAP: 2048MB (2GB)

   Cores: 2 vCPU Cores 

   75GB RAID 1+0 (10) HDD

   Up to 3 IPv4 Addresses (Please Provide Justification)

   1TB Bandwidth

   Promocode = 2gbram

 

 Price: $12.00/m $7/m Order Now

 

  OpenVZ Yearly Plans

 

 OVZ Yearly 1

 

   RAM: 64MB

   VSWAP: 64MB

   Cores: 1 vCPU Core

   15GB RAID 1+0 (10) HDD

   1 IPv4 Address

   512GB Bandwidth

  

 Price: $12.00 / yr Order Now

 

 FAQ

 

 Where are these servers located?

 These servers are located in ColoCrossing's facility in Illinois.

 

 Do we have IPv6?

 Coming Soon™ (CC)

 

 What hardware do we have?

 E3-12XX Processors with 32GB RAM and 4x 1TB Drives in LSI MegaRAID 10 w/ SSD Cache.
